desc: Sis I know you are tired of dry undefined curls. This product was created by me a 25+ year licensed cosmetologist that was absolutely tired of seeing and hearing about dry lifeless hair. We have products for WashnGos, blowouts, for the entire family. Used and loved by Mrs Tabitha Brown. Welcome to the Pür Bella Fam!

layout.text: Rosemary Mint Shampoo Rosemary Sage Conditioner
